column4: hey... i want to upgrade from KDE3 to KDE 4... how do i do it

hey... i want to upgrade from KDE3 to KDE 4... how do i do it
install kubuntu-kde4-desktop ... this won't really upgrade though, it'll just give you both KDE3 and 4...
